The above returns may be referred to in a comparative view,
on the taking into consideration the next branch of West India
trade, namely, that with the United States of America, and
which, as a matter in controversy, not less important to the mother-country
than to its West India colonies, I shall discourse of
more at large in the ensuing chapters.
R 2
